DataSourcePortable.Name: CRM_PERFORMANCE_GAUGE
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="SELECT
 C.NOME,
 ROUND((CAST(DD.REALIZADO AS FLOAT) * 100 ) /CAST(DD.META AS FLOAT),2) AS PRC
FROM K_CRM_PERFORMANCEITEM DD
JOIN K_CRM_PERFORMANCESEMANA A ON DD.PERFORMANCESEMANA = A.HANDLE
JOIN K_CRM_PERFORMANCEANO B ON B.HANDLE = A.PERFORMANCEANO
JOIN K_CRM_PERFORMANCETIPO C ON C.HANDLE = DD.TIPO
WHERE B.USUARIO = 142 AND A.SEMANA = 8
" /> <Fields> <Field Alias="NOME" From="A" Path="NOME" /> <Field Alias="PRC" From="A" Path="PRC" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
